metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12928 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** The QMP migrate command in QEMU version 4.0.0 and earlier isvulnerable to OS command injection, which allows the remote attacker toachieve code execution, denial of service, or information disclosure bysending a crafted QMP command to the listening server. Note: This has beendisputed as a non-issue since QEMU's -qmp interface is meant to be used bytrusted users. If one is able to access this interface via a tcp socketopen to the internet, then it is an insecure configuration issue.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
